title: M-02 Configuration Lock Structure (v1)
description: Defines the deterministic payload structure used by MICM to generate CH-01 (Configuration Hash). All serialization must adhere strictly to canonical JSON standards (sorted keys, no whitespace) to guarantee hash repeatability across environments.

GRS_manifest_hash.description: Cryptographic digest (e.g., SHA3-256) of the finalized Global Registry State snapshot.

RFCI_parameters.description: All required Runtime Fidelity Control Interface parameters (key/value map).

ATM_model_id.description: The specific version ID of the ATM model utilized for Stage 4 calculus.

S0X_component_versions.description: Immutable version hashes for dependent S-0x component executables (C-11, C-15, etc.).
